title: Changes to my email
content: The layout and font on my email changed. I want help to return it to what it was a couple days ago.
creator: terryt1

title: Install Earlier Version of Thunderbird
content: Can I just install an earlier version of Thunderbird and retain all of my settings and email content, yes or no?
creator: terri18

title: Upgrade to 115.3.1 Not Happening
content: I was running an older version of Thunderbird (don't ask the version because the About screen now shows 115.3.1) that had a bland color scheme (best way to describe it) that I downloaded about 6 months ago. When I first opened TB today (before attempting an upgrade) I got a screen talking about the benefits of 115.3.1 and showing colorful screens with more options than I had with the current TB. With TB open, I went to Help > About Thunderbird and the screen showed an upgrade to 115.3.1 was available. I believe I clicked Upgrade (but the upgrade may have started on its own) and the new software downloaded. I saw a message saying I had to restart to complete the upgrade and assumed that meant restart my PC. I closed all applications and restarted the computer. Opening TB, I get the same old bland screen, definitely not 115.3.1. Going to Help > About Thunderbird now gets me the message that "Thunderbird is up to date." What did I do wrong and/or what should I do to get 115.3.1 installed and functioning? I'm running Windows 11. Thanks in advance.
creator: rjfelts

title: New Thunderbird won't collapse old mail
content:
My new 115.3.1 opens the long list of all my old emails, then I have to scroll through to collapse each section. It wasn't like this on Thursday before the update. It stayed collapsed unless I clicked on the down arrows to open that section.

I want it to look like this screenshot when I open it, as it's been for years.

Can you please advise how I can fix that?
creator: Thulerose

title: How to install earlier version without losing content
content: Can I install an earlier version (prior to the Supernova, which does not work for me) and retain the content?
creator: terri18

title: Scam Email Warning
content: I have two Mac systems. An M1 2020 MacBook Pro and a 2014 Intel Mac mini, macOS Monterey on both systems. I use the email client "Postbox" which is based on Thunderbird. When I saw the announcement for Thunderbird 115 Supernova I thought I'd give it a try. Installed on the MacBook Pro, played around a bit but ended up uninstalling it. Now on the MacBook Pro, I keep getting the attached image where the email body should be. It only happens on the MacBook Pro, so I'm thinking it must have something to do with the Thunderbird installation/removal. What do I have to do/delete/change to have this go away? Thanks.
creator: Homer712

title: What happened to 'Get all new messages'??
content:
Just upgraded to SuperNova (115.3). In the previous version (102.15) there was a dropdown that had Get All New Messages - meaning from all accounts, and/or you could select any account individually to get new messages. Now in SuperNova that's been replaced with the silly little cloud/download icon, and I don't see anywhere to select all new messages vs. single account. I'm in unified view, and when I have the unified inbox selected, you'd think it would default to 'get all' from there, but it appears to be downloading from just one account. If I select one of the individual accounts on the view pane and hit 'get messages' there are new messages to retrieve there that didn't come down when the unified inbox was selected.

Is this configurable?

Thanks
creator: kvon

title: Tabs, Write messages
content: On the Thunderbird update, how do I find "Tabs" and "write"? Cannot find menu with "reply", "forward" at top of page.
creator: Kondratowitch@juno.com

title: cannot receive or send e-mails
content:
Hi all Since 26/09/2023 I haven't been able to receive or send emails on my main dektop PC. At first when trying to download e-mails I got a "Secure Connection Failed" error. I was using version 115.15.1(?) It has since updated to version 115.3 and the error message hasn't re-appeared, although I still can't send or receive anything. When I try to send an email I get this message: Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) relay.plus.net failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again. I have a laptop where I have copied all the account settings across to and that works perfectly. (on the same internet connection)

I am using Win 10 64 bit with Thunderbird 64 bit and Kaspersky IS, with Mozilla as an exception in the firewall settings.

I am a bit of a numpty with email programs, so have no idea where to start.

Regards Keith
creator: KeithN

title: Non riesco ad installare Add-on Import-Export Tool NG su Thunderbird 155.3.0; no versioni compatibili???
content:
Non riesco ad installare Add-on Import-Export Tool NG su Thunderbird 155.3.0. NON trovo ver. compatibili. So bene che lo sviluppatore di Import-Export NG è statunitense ed anche sviluppatore Thunderbird (ha un profilo gifthub), ma forse NON se ne occupa più (a calendario Import Export NG 12.0.4 è del 2023-giugno...). Mah...

Premetto che vivo in un luogo ove nessuno può o ha t di aiutarmi on site, ma da qui posso raggiungere Napoli facilmente ed anche ROMA; viaggio pure su MI.

Sono disposto a pagare e girare per l'Italia per risolvere sul mio notebook OGNI PROBLEMA con Thunderbird e Import Export Tool NG eccetera; ma prima mi si risponde, meglio è; NON so usare la discussione di Mozilla (tra l'altro) e NON so dove sia. Non ho socials e d'essi NON so NULLA. Uso Internet per lavoro, ricerche e basta. Cmq ho Firefox tra i miei browsers. Ma non era meglio vecchio metodo email e smistamento??

'IL PROBLEMA: lo decsrivo bene descrivendo anche me stesso. Vorrei incontrare dal vivo, previo scambio mail, un programmatore pro. Amministro a casa mia un sistema notebook multiutente e non riesco ad installare Add-on Import-Export Tool NG su Thunderbird 115.3.0 in quanto uso Windows 10, sono un boomer e sono abituato a comunicare SOLO via mail, ma, grazie a qualche capacità grafica ed a Shotty, ho compilato una guida per Thunderbird in Italiano (For dummies come me); TUTTAVIA Thunderbird NON è stato installato da me (che non so installare una beata cippa) e chi l'ha installato ha spocchia di dirmi che gli manca il tempo di installare il componente aggiuntivo. Tengasi presente che NEANCHE Thunderbird si installava su questo cacchio di notebook e costui (un professionista dell'economia che non ha mai t per concludere nulla, inizia le cose e NON le termina, ha studiato programmazione API per 2 aa ed ha smesso, ad esempio, poi s'è laureato in Economia, io ho invece studi giuridici e letterari dalla mia) lo ha installato smanettando (credo) nelle API (tombola...); ORA io ho usato Thunderbird che va da scheggia, ho inserito email(s) mie per usarle lì -passwords però no, immetto su richiesta-, fatto le mie ricerche su corrispondenti che (disgraziati..) mi han scritto o risposto da più di una mail, Thunderbird ha incolonnato tutto con "date (io uso date crescenti per la cronaca), Cc, Ccn, letto, non letto, allegati, dimensioni eccetera", Tutto ok, ma ORA devo esportare le mie ricerche (cartelle viola con i vari eml) su pendrive o hd esterno o cloud (attualmente NON ho clouds, cmq, e NON li so usare) e devo farlo CON QUESTA STRUTTURA con INDEX. Ho provato anche a far diversamente: io posso ANCHE copiare ed incollare files .eml su cartella esterna su hd (fatto), ma essendo 2 o 3 mails di risposta (mails dei corrispondenti, ognuno ne ha 2 o 3), a parte Cc e Ccn che comunque leggo solo entrando nel file .eml, le date di riordino mails su cartelle in pendrive (INSOMMA fuori da Thunderbird) NON sono ben lette da Sistema Operativo o office suite(s) (si, so creare una cartella di ricerca su Thunderbird, so anche creare cartelle su pendrive ed editare indici csv con excel e calc, ma SONO UNA PIPPA in SISTEMISTICA ed INSTALLAZIONI; sono bravo ad usare, ma NON ad installare); ora nel caso specifico sono andato a provare ad installare il desiato add-on, ma mi si dice che Import Export NG non può essere installato da file (Import Export Tool 12.0.4, l'ultimo cronologico, l'ho su file in mio utente in desktop ed amministro io tutti gli utenti; ho scaricato su desk perchè la barra di ricerca Thunderbird da sito En-Us mi reindirizza su sito IT e questo mi snerva) e questo perchè NON è compatibile con Thunderbird 115.3.0 (stesso risultato togliendo al programma controlllo di compatibilità); ma... per caso NON ESISTE più questa compatibilità?? Si può creare una compatibilità (di certo NON lo so fare io)?? Ed io ADESSO come ESPORTO all'esterno i miei lavori di ricerca mail?? La mia connessione non mi consente di vedere bene guide su "youtube", ma NON sono cmq focalizzate su questi problemi. Poi se qualcuno si sente in grado di aiutarmi, mi invii una mail (vabbè, non capisco niente); INSOMMA COME DEVO CONTATTARE (no socials, no whatsapp, non ho cloud nè so usare chat, si email). Non so neanche come si entra in discussione e come se ne creano.

Cord. sal., Guicap.
creator: guicap3x3

title: Supernova issues - delete scrolls message list, and messages that have been read stay bold
content: I have two problems with Supernova that I hope will be corrected in future bug fix upgrades. 1. When I delete an email the display resets with the location of the deleted email off screen at the top. I have to scroll back up all that way to go back to work on my next emails. In the past it did not reset the screen - everything stayed the same, just without the deleted email. 2. Emails I have not read are in bold. I have not been able to identify why, but some emails do not change off bold once I have read them. The just sit there as bold no matter how many times I click on them.
creator: mruby3

title: New Version of Thunderbird
content: New Version of Thunderbird leaves the preview pane blank. How do I get it to work or if not possible, how to go back to prior version?
creator: jrelay5

title: Thunderbird 115.3.1 - Erro SMTP server
content: Boa tarde, Quando o Thunderbird se atualizou para a nova versão 115.3.1 (Aurora), fiquei sem conseguir usar os servidores de envio do "smtp.office365.com". Não fiz qualquer outra alteração ao Thunderbird para além da atualização automática. Tenho outra conta de email no "gmail" a qual não sofreu qualquer "avaria". Anexo pdf com o erro. Já removi os servidores smtp do gestor de palavras passe e voltei a tentar enviar um email, mas repete o erro e não se altera se eu selecionar "Voltar a tentar" ou "Introduza a nova palavra-passe" (não abre o token para introduzir nova palavra-passe), fica algum tempo a "pensar" e volta a dar o erro. Preciso pois de ajuda. Uso o Thunderbird há muito e até hoje tudo se resolveu pelo que agradeço desde já uma solução para este grande constrangimento. Luis Almeida
creator: correiogeral

title: Clearing "Junk" folder & size
content:
Toad-Hall,

Sorry for going off-topic - Initially, "Clearing "Junk" folder", I expected to be a very simple question - BUT - NOT.

Anyway, you answered "How to clear the "Junk" folder & size" (It makes no sense to me - BUT - gets the job done) - Thank you.

The image of my folder structure I sent the first time was before I learned of "***" / "Show Total Message Count" & "Show Folder Size" which I like to know (NOW - I know).

title: Adding yandex.ru account via normal password
content: Hello! I'm having problems with setting up my yandex account in Thunderbird. App password is absolutely correct. The most curious thing is I was able to setup another yandex account, but now I can't setup the second. I asked yandex for support, but they told me to ask you for help. Could you help me please?
creator: a.v.nokhrin

title: Latest update, (115.3.1 (64-bit)), limited the size of the preview window too much.
content:
I usually like to have 4 emails visible in the upper right window and view emails in the lower right 'preview' window. The most recent update limited the size of the preview window, so I can see lots of emails in the upper right window and only an inch or so in the preview window. I prefer to see fewer headers in the upper right window and more 'preview' in the lower right window.

I like Thunderbird and have been using it for many years. This latest update 'fixed' something that didn't need 'fixing'. Thank you.
creator: steved384574

title: Apply columns to... Tags folder
content:
Using Tb 115.3.1 I've checked/shown "Tags" folders in my Folder pane. I've customized all other folders' columns by first having my desired selection on one folder, then "Apply Columns to Folder and its children..." for each account I have. I've looked into applying the same to my "Tags" folders but I couldn't find if there is such possibility?

At the end I applied my preferred columns to each "Tags" folder individually. For tag-folders I added "Account" column as well but I wanted the rest of the columns as with my other account folders. It would be nice if "Tags" folders could be targeted by the "Apply columns to...".
creator: stanio

title: visualizzazione del numero totale di elementi nelle cartelle
content: Quale componente aggiuntivo posso scaricare per ottenere la visualizzazione del numero di componenti in ogni cartella ?
creator: g-gnocchi

title: Thunderbird emIL ACCOUNT ON NEW Lptop
content: cannot receive email messages in my existing email account. The account exists for some time
creator: josephgarito

title: Email attachments I sent.
content: I sent 2 attachments in several emails lately, but when I open my own attachments, my selected files do not show up. Instead I see the cover page of the last folder I had open. What's wrong
creator: bessemer

title: Tbird Emails Tab is Blank
content: Since update to 115 Portable now the emails window is completely blank Have tried rolling back to earlier version Tried 115.3.1 and.0
creator: ensta

title: Opt out of notices to upgrade to newer version
content: The only choices for installing updates to Thunderbird are 1. install automatically or 2. Notify me and let me choose. Could there be a third choice so that I don't get notified at all? I have been extremely happy with this mail program and have used it exclusively for more than a decade. Perhaps I am stuck in my ways but I tried the newest version and decided I much preferred the look and feel of version 102 more. Obviously it is not difficult to keep declining to update but it would be nice if I didn't have to see the notice all the time. Thanks for your help and for maintaining a great program
creator: david533

title: Thunderbird forces as active/focused window and using another program
content:
This issue started as soon as Thunderbird updated to 115.3.1 (64 bits).

I was in another window, a full screen (borderless) game, and as soon as I received a new e-mail, Thunderbird minimized the game to focus on the Thunderbird window. I tested this sending a e-mail to myself and the same thing happened but also tested this while writing this message and this time the focus did not change to Thunderbird.

So as a workaround I am having to close Thunderbird as I am playing games.
creator: Rafcor

title: ver 115.2.2 (32-bit) does not display email account under account header
content:
My thunderbird just upgraded to 115.2.2 (32-bit) - my windows is 64-bit - but when I create a new folder:

(1) It does not copy the headers from the other folders, as it used to, which is not the end of the world -- I'm just forced to re-create them (which has never happened before in all the years of upgrades) (2) Under the Account header, it should show the email a/c I used to send that email (or the a/c that received that email) but instead it just displays "Local Folders"

I need to know which email it was sent from/received at. How do I get it to display the email account and not "local folders"? Thank you!
creator: valarcher

title: Inquiry About Multi-Account Support for Gmail and Custom Domain Email Providers
content:
Dear Mozilla Support Team,

I hope this email finds you well. I am currently using Mozilla's email client and have some questions regarding its capabilities for multi-account support.

1. Gmail Support: I am already using Gmail with Mozilla and would like to confirm that this setup will continue to be supported.

2. Custom Domain Support: I am in the process of setting up a private domain and am considering using hover.com or fastmail.com as my email provider. Can Mozilla support email accounts from these providers alongside Gmail?

3. Multi-Account Management: Is it possible to manage both Gmail and a custom domain email account within the same Mozilla client? If so, are there any limitations or special configurations that I should be aware of?

Your guidance on these matters would be greatly appreciated as I look to optimize my email management setup.

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards, David
creator: dsabine

title: 115.3.1 (64-bit) on Win10 taking over a minute to start up
content:
115.3.1 (64-bit) on Win10 Taking over a minute to start up. NOT Add-On related. I have also booted Windows in Safe Mode and it took even longer. I often wish to refer to my email saves and this Delay is most tedious to say the least.

Would it be possible for me to Roll Back to the previous v115 ?

Uncertain as to the version ‘points’ of my previous install, but I keep up with most updates, so it would have been August’s version most likely.

Sorry for any typos; my aim has been dodgy since my last eye op.
creator: Kozmyk

title: Hyperlinks do not work in Thunderbird
content:
App: Thunderbird Version: 115.3.0 FRESH INSTALL

OS: `$ cat /etc/os-release` NAME="Rocky Linux" VERSION="9.2 (Blue Onyx)" ID="rocky" ID_LIKE="rhel centos fedora" VERSION_ID="9.2" PLATFORM_ID="platform:el9" PRETTY_NAME="Rocky Linux 9.2 (Blue Onyx)" ANSI_COLOR="0;32" LOGO="fedora-logo-icon" CPE_NAME="cpe:/o:rocky:rocky:9::baseos" HOME_URL="https://rockylinux.org/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.rockylinux.org/" SUPPORT_END="2032-05-31" ROCKY_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="Rocky-Linux-9" ROCKY_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION="9.2" REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="Rocky Linux" REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION="9.2"

Installed via Linux-native "Software" app that installed it via Flathub/flatpak.

I have no add-ons/extensions/whatnot.

Everything else but link opening works.

I have read and worked through the Hyperlinks in Messages Not Working article. I tried default app for "Web" both "Firefox" and "Vivaldi". None work.

There are no "content" settings that would clash on "HTTP / HTTPS content type".
creator: sebastijan.salak

title: Can't add GMX account
content: I cannot add my GMX account. I have been told by many people to enter different settings and things, and nothing works.
creator: LaughingMan008

title: Title pop up "balloon" (?)
content:
Minor issue.

TB 115.2.3 (64-bit) Supernova, Windows 10.

Don't know what it is called, the "text balloon" that sometimes pops up when you hover (when enabled I guess) over something.

In this case it is the "Subject" field in emails when viewing any folder.

Just noticed that if I am viewing the emails in a folder and have the cursor over the "Subject" line of a particular email, such that the "balloon" has popped up and is visible, if I press the "DELETE" key, the message will be deleted but the balloon does not change, but retains the previous "Subject" line text.

A minor issue, to be sure, but, I guess it is a bug. I did sign up for a Bugzilla account, but, not keen on disclosing some of the information gathered. Just as soon leave the bug reporting to someone else, if they can duplicate the problem, or care.

Thanks.
creator: joea-too

title: ThunderBird consuming over 100G of memory after computer enters sleep mode with the software open
content:
I recently noticed an issue after waking my MAC Book M1 (2020) from several days of sleep. Upon opening the lid, I was met with a system warning about low memory. Further investigation revealed that ThunderBird was using over 100G of memory.

Just a few days ago, I had updated my MAC to Sonoma 14.0, and last week ThunderBird was updated to version 115.3.0. Both were significant version upgrades, and I'm unsure where the problem lies.

I haven't installed any additional extensions or plugins, as shown in the attached screenshot. However, I did notice some components listed in the debug information, and I'm not sure why there's an inconsistency.

I will continue to monitor this issue to see if it reoccurs. For now, I'm just reporting this as a single instance along with my system information, hoping it's an isolated case.

title: Downloading from multiple accounts
content: I have several Gmail POP3 accounts. When I click 'Get Messages' in Thunderbird, I want to download only from some of those accounts, not all of them. This happens at the moment, but I want to change the list of accounts which I access everytime and I can't remember - nor find - where the setting is to tell Thunderbird which ones to download and which not to. Can anyone help please?
creator: chris.osment14

title: "Report message" in Thunderbird chat
content: Hi, what does "report message" in Thunderbird chat actually does? it shows when selecting message in matrix private groups
creator: mare1203

title: Email Download
content: Hi I have been using thunderbird for a long time and in the last couple of days, it will not download emails for any of my accounts. I am running Version 115.3.1 from my desktop machine. My laptop which is running Version 102 will download emails from all my accounts. I am assuming the latest upgrade has affected the downloads.
creator: peefjay

title: thunderbird attachments problem
content:
Hi,

I hope you are doing well. I tried posting this topic yesterday, but for some reason I don't think it has been posted. I'm having an issue with thunderbird attachments, that is, saving them. But before I describe my issue, please give keyboard only solutions as I'm completely blind. I tried to contact the thunderbird groups io but I still don't have posting permissions. Anyway back to the issue. So I open the sent message. I press the toggal button, which shows the list of attachments. Rather than wanting to click save as or save all attachments, I want to copy the attachments that somebody has sent me. The problem is, while it coppies the last attachment with control c, I can't copy the first one, even though when I reach the top jaws and NVDA speak the first file. Is there an addon to fix this problem? If so, please let me know.

Best regards, Muhammad.
creator: muhammed3198

title: Не запускается Thunderbird не может найти профиль
content:
Не запускается Thunderbird не может найти профиль mac os 10,14. Предыдущий запуск было все нормально. Работаыла завершено корректно. Программа не запускается вообще. Перестанавливал, файлов профилей в принципе нет, все что было связано с почтой вычистил.

Про английский язык: на языке нацистов и убийц разговаривать не собираюсь!
creator: Rusber_Optic

title: Contents of inbox partially lost.
content: On 27 September I was prompted to send an error report to Mozilla, which I did. When I checked my email, I found that the contents of my inbox had disappeared - there was only a blank space. Later I found that the missing mail was only for this year - mail from 31 Dec 2022 and before then is still there. And new emails arriving since then are displayed normally. Any idea what has happened? And is it possible to get the missing emails restored? Thank you. Nick Terdre
creator: nickterdre

title: Change in home page
content: Hi I am using Thunderbird & Edge. For years I have had notification of new unread emails under Inbox, I have clicked on Inbox and opened them. No Problem A couple of weeks ago this changed, after I believe an update. Now I still get the notification of new emails (& number of) in Inbox but could not access them. I discovered that now I have to click on the line above (which is my email address) which takes me to another page where I have to click on Read Messages which takes me back to Inbox! Why all this palaver. Please do not reply using jargon as I won't understand it. Gavin
creator: gavinmcardle706

title: User Manual/Documentation
content: Doing a search for 'Thunderbird User Manual' gets some 400+ hits, only one of which involves documentation. That one hit, a request for purchasing help for a bound user manual, has a response that "Being a free product, there is no nicely-written, bound, reference manual...We're very proud of what we do and of the documentation available." Linux, another free product, is documented in numerous "nicely-written, bound, reference manual[s]", as are most free software products. The string-search approach used here for help sometimes does not work well, and can often yield incorrect answers applying to other/older versions of the software. I am surprised at the response from a 'Top 10 Contributor' and not at all clear on the reason for the vehemence of the response. Browsers and email clients would seem to be the applications most likely to be used by the naive user, whom I would think we should encourage to seek and use documentation. As a software engineer, I certainly understand the preference for writing code over writing documentation, but also recognize the importance of well-maintained documentation. Is there something I am missing here? To my mind, the absence of coherent, date/version specific documentation is perhaps the greatest weakness in this product.
creator: dumpsterdan

title: Yahoo mail limited to 10000 mails
content: Yahoo mail limited to view 10000 mails only in one folder. After this Ten Thousand mails First in First Out method it was remove from Particular Folder. I am using Both Gmail and Yahoo Mail. But yahoo only i am facing this issue. Kindly rectify this issue.
